thread.section_title: CardKangaroo.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CardKangaroo.com | cardkangaroo.com | 6 of 81
thread.title: Ras1112

author: Ras1112
title: Ras1112
text:
Needed e-gift card, fast to use limited time online offer from PetsMart.
No place but Kangaroo had it at the time and thanks to these guys it worked!
Transaction went smooth and fast, got timely call back to verify the purchase and 10 min later I was placing my online order. Discounts not as big as others offer from time to time, however I don't have long history with this company to comment on pricing. In any case, satisfied customer here and I'll advice you to try these guys if you need something fast
